name: Slow-Cooker Red Curry Soup With Chicken and Kale
description: Blasted with lime, this red curry soup contains a commingling of chicken, kale, potatoes and mushrooms.
recipeIngredient: 3 1/2 cups low-sodium homemade or store bought chicken broth
1 1/2 cups tightly packed chopped kale leaves
2 small potatoes, such as Yukon Gold, diced
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/4 cup fresh-squeezed lime juice, plus one reserved lime wedge, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, chicken broth, coconut milk, curry paste, curry powder, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, onion, red pepper, jalapeño, kale, potatoes and mushrooms in a slow cooker, along with lime wedge. Season with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 hours.
Discard lime wedge and shred chicken. Add fish sauce and lime juice. Taste and adjust seasonings, if needed. Stir to combine, ladle into bowls and serve.
